title: Why my display turn yellow wen I watch hdr contents on YouTube ? PS: night mode is off .
content:
Hello there
My screen turn yellow wen I watch hdr content on YouTube for example , no matter what sitting I m using (auto brightness on/off , it's worse with night mode, adaptive , natural...). Also I find my display a bit to warm over all  is there any way to calibrate my screen ?
Thanks .
